spec_data.Name: clufter-lib-pcs
spec_data.Description:
This package contains set of additional plugins targeting Pacemaker cluster
configuration: either experimental commands or internally unused, reusable
formats and filters.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 11:05:05 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Extra plugins for transforming/analyzing Pacemaker configuration
